medical_history.chief_complaint: Thickened, fissured, and peeling palms and soles present since childhood.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms have been present since childhood, described as thickened, fissured, and peeling skin on palms and soles. The symptoms improve with medication (acitretin 25 mg/day).
medical_history.past_medical_history: Medical history significant for loss of primary teeth with no growth of permanent teeth.
medical_history.family_history: Family history was negative for similar problems and for skin cancer.
